definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: Click on the correct colored object.
Voxels that do not show a significant intensity change during the activity period are not colored.
sentences.chinese: 體素不表現出顯著的強度變化，在活動期間不著色。

sentences.english: Xeroderma pigmentosum is an autosomal recessive disease.
sentences.chinese: 著色性幹皮病是一種常染色體的退行性疾病。

sentences.english: Thousands of dragon coloring pages free for children to "write" or color " online.
sentences.chinese: 數以千計的免費龍著色頁爲孩子們寫出來或彩色聯機。

sentences.english: A technology of surface chemical coloring of stainless steel for cooking utensil is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一種廚具用不鏽鋼的表面化學著色工藝。

sentences.english: Gets the maximum number of instruction slots supported by the specified pixel shader version.
sentences.chinese: 取得值，這個值指出是否支援指定的像素著色器版本。

sentences.english: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified pixel shader version can be rendered in software on the current system.
sentences.chinese: 取得值，這個值指出是否支援指定的像素著色器版本。

sentences.english: Second, color the four fingers so that they look like feathers.
sentences.chinese: 接著將四隻手指著色，讓它們看起來像羽毛一樣。

sentences.english: Tint leaves the footage colors but wipes out darks .
sentences.chinese: 著色使得畫面的色彩，但清除掉深色衣物。

sentences.english: This yoghurt contains NO artificial flavouring or colouring.
sentences.chinese: 這種酸乳酪不含人造香料或著色劑。

sentences.english: The absence of color in that drawing makes it dull.
sentences.chinese: 那幅畫因沒有著色而顯得晦暗。

sentences.english: Recoloring is the process of adjusting image colors.
sentences.chinese: 重新著色是指調整影像色彩的程序。

sentences.english: Material and colorant prices are public ally available.
sentences.chinese: 材料和著色劑的價格都是公開的盟友。

definition: to touch up (a piece of writing)/to add details (to a painting)
gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
shade (of a color, i.e. light or dark)
rough sketch (of a painting)/(of an official) to approve a document by signing it
variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
variant of 臘梅|腊梅[la4 mei2]
bright and beautiful/(of a landscape) gorgeous/(of a color) vibrant
to trace over/to copy (a calligraphy model)/facsimile/(fig.) to depict/to portray
